messages.subject: Don Myra of Gaijin's Guide
messages.msgSnippet: Hello, does anybody know what has happened to Don Myra s Gaijin Sword Polishing Webpage? It seems to have been deleted. Also I had tried to reach Don by e-mail
messages.messageBody:
Hello,

does anybody know what has happened to Don Myra's Gaijin Sword
Polishing Webpage? It seems to have been deleted.

Also I had tried to reach Don by e-mail but my mails keep on getting
bounced back. If anyone knows what has happened to Don or been in
touch with him recently please kindly let me know!

Thank you,

Max
